function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases transmission through shared mobile interface and web platform","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases among occupants","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of shared surfaces and implementation of touchless interfaces","Technologies":"Touchless interfaces, antimicrobial coatings, UV disinfection systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, and users of the IBEM system","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and technology providers"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality monitoring","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality leading to respiratory illnesses","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems and installation of air quality sensors","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, ventilation system maintenance tools","People":"Occupants and visitors of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers, facility management, and air quality experts"},{"Description":"Lack of integration between objective and subjective IEQ data","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of indoor environmental quality","Mitigation":"Integration of objective and subjective data for comprehensive analysis and decision-making","Technologies":"Data fusion algorithms, machine learning for pattern recognition","People":"Occupants, building managers, and data analysts","Owner":"Building managers, data analysts, and technology providers"}]}
